game.title: The Lost City
game.synopsis: In the heart of the Amazon rainforest, a team of archaeologists search for an ancient lost city. As the player, you join the expedition and embark on a thrilling adventure filled with danger and discovery.
game.beginning: You are a young archaeologist named Alex, who has dedicated his life to finding the fabled Lost City of El Dorado. After years of research, you finally gather a team of experts and set off for the Amazon rainforest.
game.ending: Through countless obstacles and perilous encounters, you uncover the secret location of the Lost City. Inside, you find unimaginable treasures and witness the ancient civilization's mysterious downfall. As you make it out alive, you return to civilization, forever changed by the remarkable journey.
